definition: to draw support from/with the help of
to lend/to borrow/by means of/to take (an opportunity)

sentences.english: With these components, you are ready to begin the process of automatic dialogue replacement, " or "ADR" for short.
sentences.chinese: 借助于这些资料，你便可以开始自动对白替换工作。

sentences.english: With an asynchronous model, the queue itself acts as a relief valve.
sentences.chinese: 借助异步模型，队列本身可以充当一个减压阀。

sentences.english: So he hold his realism by developing his theory on verisimilitude.
sentences.chinese: 这样他就借助逼真性观念坚持了自己的实在论。

sentences.english: I know radio began by restoring the ancient art of storyteller .
sentences.chinese: 我知道，广播的开始是借助于说书人这种古老艺术。

sentences.english: She defeated the bad guy by virtue of her courage and by a pair of vices.
sentences.chinese: 由于她的勇气和借助一对老虎钳，她打败了那个坏蛋。

sentences.english: All the drum tiles are connected through a drag spring.
sentences.chinese: 所有鼓瓦间借助拉簧连接在一起。

sentences.english: The structures of both are characterized by FT-TR and 1H-NMR.
sentences.chinese: 借助红外光谱和1H核磁共振谱图分析了产物的结构。

sentences.english: With multiple nodes, load-balancing and fail-over become possible.
sentences.chinese: 借助多个节点，负载平衡和故障转移变得可能。

sentences.english: Telling Holding is keeping a quick growth with capital market.
sentences.chinese: 天音控股上市以来借助资本市场保持了快速的发展。

sentences.english: Use the straps inside the bag to prevent the clothes from moving.
sentences.chinese: 那就借助包里的带子来阻止衣物移动吧。

sentences.english: They visit quite frequently with their flying saucers and invasive experiments.
sentences.chinese: 借助飞碟及其他侵入的实验频繁造访人类。

sentences.english: Qin aggrandizement was aided by frequent military expeditions pushing forward the frontiers in the north and south.
sentences.chinese: 秦扩张是借助频繁的军事远征推进边界北部和南部。

sentences.english: China's tourist hotspots are hoping to capitalize on this homebody spirit.
sentences.chinese: 中国的旅游热点地区正希望借助这股爱国热情。

sentences.english: With this platform, small porcupines will play a big collective strength.
sentences.chinese: 借助这个平台，小豪猪们将发挥出大集体的力量。

sentences.english: Meanwhile, Coca-Cola is trying to get hipper without the help of any celebrities.
sentences.chinese: 同时，可口可乐正在尝试不借助名人的效应赶上时代。

sentences.english: Each book carving was made using sharp knives , tweezers, and scissors .
sentences.chinese: 每一本书雕都是借助锋利的刀片，镊子和剪刀完成的。

definition: to exploit/to make use of/to use/to take advantage of/to utilize
by means of/through/via/to pass through/to get through/to adopt/to pass (a bill or inspection etc)/to switch over
to rely on sth (for support etc)/to depend on
to borrow sth for another use/to borrow an idea for one's own use
to push (for acceptance of a plan)/to push forward/to promote/to actuate/CL:個|个[ge4]
